import React, { useState , useEffect } from 'react'; import './CSS/dash.css'; import Ellipse from "../assests/Ellipse 1.png"; import line1 from "../assests/Line 1.png"; import line2 from "../assests/Line 2.png"; import line3 from "../assests/Line 3.png"; import rect1 from "../assests/rect1.jpg"; import rect2 from "../assests/rect2.jpg"; function Dashboard({User, Email}) { var [date,setDate] = useState(new Date()); useEffect(() => { var timer = setInterval(()=>setDate(new Date()), 1000 ) return function cleanup() { clearInterval(timer) } }); return ( <>

Welcome, {User} Today is {date.toLocaleString()} {Email}

Personal Finance Portfolio

) }; export default Dashboard;
